name: 國際生初級臺語
description: 本課程主要採英語授課，對象為母語非華語或臺灣本土語言的學生，以教授臺語之基本生活會話為主，輔以基礎讀寫的教學，適合對建立臺語基本聽、說、讀、寫能力有興趣之非本地生選修
goals: 學會臺語羅馬字拼讀，並透過教材接觸臺語常用漢字
能用臺語進行日常問候及自我介紹，包括基本資料、家庭狀況及個人喜好等
能用臺語表達基本生活用語，包括數字、時間、顏色、方向、稱呼等
能用臺語進行簡單的主題會話，包括：購物、問路、點餐等
syllabus:
Sep. 16

*   Introduction to the language (its speakers, typology, history…)
    
*   Pronunciation practice with often-used phrases.
    

Sep. 23

*   Vowels
    
*   Greetings and some useful expressions
    
*   Names of fruit and some snacks
    

Sep. 30

*   Vowels (review)
    
*   Self-introduction
    
*   Borrowing and returning
    

Oct. 7

*   Consonants
    
*   Numbers
    
*   Appellations and kinship terminology
    

Oct. 14

*   Vowels and consonants (review)
    
*   Spelling practices
    
*   Numbers (review)
    
*   Date and time
    

Oct. 21

*   Eating out and more food terms
    

Oct. 28

*   Spelling practices
    
*   Citation tones
    
*   Shopping
    
*   Singing: Pùn-sò-tshia (Mayday)
    

Nov. 4

*   Practices with citation tones
    
*   Holidays and traveling
    
*   Some animal names
    
*   Making questions in Taiwanese
    

**Nov. 11 Midterm exam**

Nov. 18

*   Basic tone sandhi
    
*   Hanging out
    
*   Some color terms
    

Nov. 25

*   Spelling practices
    
*   Hobbies
    
*   Singing: Gōng-lâng (Mayday)
    

Dec. 2

*   Tone neutralization
    
*   Asking directions
    

Dec. 9

*   Jobs and professions
    
*   Hué-tshinn-bûn
    
*   Singing: Suann-tíng ê Oo-káu-hiann (Âng It-hong)
    

Dec. 16

*   Special tone sandhi
    
*   Seeing a doctor and emergency
    
*   Grammatical aspects
    

Dec. 23

*   Resultatives and object positions
    
*   Venues, locations and localizers
    
*   Principles of tone sandhi occurrences in a sentence
    

Dec. 30

*   Some colloquial terms and sentence patterns
    
*   Idioms and sayings
    
*   Grammatical differences between Taiwanese and Mandarin
    

Jan. 6  Review and practices

**Jan. 13  Final exam**

methodologies.note: 由教師講解學習內容並回答疑問
透過情境設計，由學生發想解決方案（使用適當的句子、會話設計等）
透過台語流行音樂學習詞彙及句子、使用互動軟體進行課堂回應及考核。
兩人一組或多人一組進行對話演練

grading.note: 含課堂測驗、演練及課後作業
可能形式包括紙筆及聽說測驗、個人口頭報告、小組展演
